name: From the Depths
description: Over 1000 unique components allow you to build and command voxel vehicles from the deep ocean to outer space- including battleships, planes, submarines and space ships! Forge strategies, allegiances and fleets strong enough to destroy eight deadly factions of the planet and reign supreme.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT / ATI Radeon HD 3870 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ® compatible on-board Additional Notes: Steam connection required to play the game
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Quad Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 7800 series Storage: 1 GB available space
